string-array.name: cardsLove
string-array.item: You are feeling fulfilled and loved, whether thats with yourself, a significant other, family members, or friendships.
There may be some unexpected changes coming in your love life, so be prepared to accommodate and stay positive.
There is a great change coming in your relationships, it might be painful but it will allow you to rebuild yourself better than before.
Consider your actions when it comes to love and how they may be too excessive.
Bask in the happiness that your relationships bring you.
You may be in a caring and passionate relationship, but be careful of emotions like jealousy and anger.
Right now is a time of healing. Have hope that things will improve.
You are feeling uncertain about your relationships, be sure to understand your intentions and the intentions of others.
Create opportunities for love and you will find it.
Take some time to find balance in your relationships.
Treat the people you love fairly, and remember to make compromises.
Consider reflecting on the issues in your relationships and how you can improve them.
Remain patient and honest in your relationships.
Remember to treat your partners with love and respect.
You should consider taking some time alone before taking on a relationship.
Dont rush into a relationship, or force something to happen.
You are embarking on a new journey in love. Take risks and be bold.
Remember to be nurturing and caring in your relationships.
Bring logic to your relationship.
You or someone around you may be feeling tempted, so make sure you communicate your intentions to others.
Learn to accommodate changes in your romantic life.
Take control of your love life and you will see rewards.

string-array.name: cardsCareer
string-array.item: You are about to complete a major career challenge, so enjoy your hard work and celebrate your success!
You may be considering a switch in your career, and now is the time to go for it.
Right now you may be very stressed and there are many unknowns surrounding you. Remember that in the long term, these issues may lead to opportunities.
Success is coming for you, but you must be patient and stay dedicated.
Continued positivity will bring you success, dont be down on yourself.
Harness your passion and use it to make big career moves.
Remain positive about the path you are on. You will achieve your goals as long as you focus on them.
You may be feeling unsure about what direction to go in your career.
Take advantage of the opportunities around you.
Your work relationships are important, make sure to maintain them.
Act with honesty and take responsibility for your actions.
You are learning a lot of new things about yourself that could be helpful in your future career.
Try and take some time to learn new things that will benefit your work.
You need to work with others and collaborate to accomplish your goals.
Make sure to keep your long term goals in mind, and pursue what makes you happy.
You may be in a period of waiting in your career, so take time to plan ahead.
New beginnings are on the way, so be courageous and take the opportunities you are presented with.
You are feeling more passionate than usual, try to funnel that into your work.
You have been working hard, so stay disciplined and you will be rewarded.
You may be feeling chained down, and blaming it on others, but you have more options than you realize.
You may be going through a career transition, so remember that change is good and healthy.
Steer clear of distractions and focus on completing your goals.

string-array.name: cardsDaily
string-array.item: Today will be a harmonious day.
Accepting the inevitable is a part of life.
You may be feeling like things are falling apart, but remember, in order to grow, change must occur.
In times of stress, remember to stay calm and be patient with yourself.
Try and stay positive today. You shine, be proud of that.
Today you can accomplish anything you put your mind to.
Be confident today, and keep on trekking.
Be aware of whats causing your current anxieties and work on overcoming it.
Its time to tap into your full potential.
Take time to appreciate your relationships.
Remember that what you give out to the world, comes back to you.
Today, take the time to self-reflect and find new meaning.
Listen to your gut instinct and you will find the answers you seek.
Following tradition isnt always a bad thing.
Take time to do some soul searching today.
Its OK to take a step back sometimes, if it brings success in the future.
Have courage to take risks and you will be rewarded.
Be kind to yourself. Self care is extremely important.
Your goals present you with a chance to grow, so dont give up on them.
Try and direct your impulsive energy and actions towards more positive things.
You are going through a major change, embrace the future and let go of the past.
Take control of your life and remain focused on completing what needs to be done.
